thread.title: Ground News - Caught on camera: Porch pirate sought by Miramar police
thread.title_full: Ground News - Caught on camera: Porch pirate sought by Miramar police

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Caught on camera: Porch pirate sought by Miramar police
text:
Summary by Ground News Miramar police released surveillance video of the culprit Thursday. Police identified the culprit as Derrick Robinson. Robinson was seen in several videos from different homes, walking up to the front door and grabbing multiple packages. Police have also released a video of who they believe was Robinson's driver. Share menu More

WPLG Center High Factuality Individual: Howard Buffett Caught on camera: Porch pirate sought by Miramar police A holiday Grinch was caught on camera swiping packages from at least three homes in Miramar, according to police.Miramar police released surveillance video of the culprit Thursday, who they identified as Derrick Robinson, stealing multiple packages from residents in the city’s River Run community on Nov. 11.Video shows the Robinson walking up to the front door of a home, swiping packages and then placing them in a black Nissan Kicks before fleei…
